description.ko: 코드와 엽록소가 공존하며 수학적 미학의 영원한 봄 속에 피어나는 정원.
description.en: A garden where code and chlorophyll coexist, blooming in a timeless spring of mathematical beauty.

prompt: A mechanical hummingbird with wings made of iridescent fractal geometry, sipping liquid light from a flower with translucent, binary-coded petals. Nature reclaiming technology, soft pastel colors of pink and emerald. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic, macro photography style. Intricate textures of blooming digital petals and metallic feathers with subsurface scattering. Soft bokeh background, cinematic lighting with a focus on the delicate interactions between the digital flora and the mechanical fauna.
